divs: sighting detailsdear sir \ madam ; i just wanted to let you know what exactly you need to be looking for : 1) the ufos are colorless 2) their approximate speed is 18,000 mph without creating any air friction 3) the ufos material is not anything of the periodic tables 4) the ufos material is able to light as activated 5) the ets are two kinds a) colorless b) jet black 6) the ets abilities are; a) the colorless type : can here everyone & more ................ b) the jet black type : they have black solid substance that can ....... c) both et type are approximately 3-4 feet tall. i have more info if you are interested to know. sincerely, *(wit's name deleted--cms\sg).
Summary: They are colorless, soundless and they do not creat any air friction
